modName: Polish Nord Commander male voice for Additional Player Voices mod

for

*************************************************************

This small mod adding Polish voice for player from original Nord commander voice( from Polish version of Skyrim ).

This is only .wav files.
You need *Ad
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]t__k6HJWZvY[/youtube]
[center][size=4]Polish male Nord commander voice
for [b]
"Additional Player Voices for Skyrim"[/b][/size]
*************************************************************

Ta małą modyfikacja dodaje polski głos dla bohatera do modu *Additional Player Voices for Skyrim*

Głos jest z oficialnego polskiego spolszczenia. Jest to głos Norda, taki sam jak np. u strażników.



*************************************************************
Instalacja

Po prostu wrzuć folder "set1" do [.../data/sound/fx/nhva] i zamień pliki



Jeśli twiedzisz że bohater za dużo gada, usuń niektóre pliki .wav :)

*************************************************************

****************************************************************************************************************************
This small mod adding Polish voice for player from original Nord commander voice( from Polish version of Skyrim ).

This is only .wav files.
You need *Additional Player Voices for Skyrim mod*!

You can download this mod by this link:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21215/?

*************************************************************
Installation

Just put "set1" folder to [.../data/sound/fx/nhva]

*************************************************************

C.Z.R Ress Project[TM]
----------------------

Additional Player Voices for Skyrim

Author: nanahane

URL: http://seven-wings.blogspot.jp/
-------------------------------------------------------------[/center]
